name: SCP: Blackout
description:
Overview
You are a new D-Class personnel in a secret SCP research facility when everything falls apart. Use what you can find as you explore the facility, access logs to learn about the SCP entities in containment, and run for your life from the SCP entities that have escaped.

Features:
Built for VR, but also playable on desktop.
Logs and stories to learn and explore for various SCPs.
Atmospheric environment.
